continuum-skin-desc:
Epesi 2 mposo ya Vecteur:
* 2011 - Version Moderne ya MonoBook na lolenge ya sika mpe na bobongisi mingi ya bosaleli.
* 2022 - Vecteur oyo etongami lokola eteni ya projet WMF [https://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Desktop_Improvements Desktop Improvements].
prefs-continuum-enable-continuum-1-help: Na mwa bambula oyo ekoya, tokozala kosala mise à jour mokemoke loposo ya Continuum. Legacy Continuum eko permettre yo otala version ya kala ya Continuum (kobanda décembre 2019). Mpo na koyeba makambo mingi na ntina ya bozongisi, kende na lokasa na biso ya projet [https://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Reading/Web/Desktop_Improvements].
continuum-opt-out-tooltip: Bobongola ba paramètres na bino po bozonga na lolenge ya kala ya loposo (legacy Continuum)
continuum-language-button-aria-label: Kende na lisolo moko na monɔkɔ mosusu. Ezali na {{PLURAL:$1| $1 monoko| $1 minoko}}
continuum-no-language-button-aria-label: Lisolo oyo ezali kaka na monoko oyo. Bakisa lisolo mpo na minɔkɔ mosusu
continuum-jumptocontent: Kopumbwa na makambo oyo ezali na kati
continuum-appearance-tooltip: Bobongola ndenge bonene ya makomi, bonene mpe langi ya lokasa yango ezali komonana
skin-theme-description: [Version expérimentale, probabilité makasi ya kokutana na ba problèmes] Ekitisaka pole oyo ebimaka na ba écrans ya appareil.
skin-theme-exclusion-notice: Lokasa oyo ezalaka toujours na mode lumière.
continuum-anon-user-menu-pages: Nkasa mpo na ba éditeurs oyo babimaki
continuum-anon-user-menu-pages-label: Yekola makambo mingi na ntina ya kobongisa makambo
continuum-toc-menu-tooltip: Tableau ya makambo oyo ezali na kati
continuum-toc-collapsible-button-label: Toggle na tableau ya makambo oyo ezali na kati
continuum-feature-custom-font-size-exclu: Lokasa oyo esalela ntango nyonso bonene ya makomi ya mikemike
continuum-feature-limited-width-exclusio: Makambo oyo ezali na kati ezali monene ndenge ekoki mpo na lininisa ya navigateur na yo.
continuum-prefs-limited-width-help: Activer mode ya largeur limitée pona ko améliorer expérience ya kotanga.
empty-language-selector-body: Makambo ya lokasa oyo esimbami te na minɔkɔ mosusu.
continuum-page-tools-unpinned-popup: Menu ya bisaleli esili kokende awa.
continuum-beta-preview-description: Zua accès noki na ba fonctionnalités ya sika ya accès ya kotanga, lokola ba améliorations ya typographie na mode ya molili.
continuum-night-mode-gadget-warning: Ozali kosalela gadget ya mode molili oyo ezali ko interférer na fonctionnalité oyo. [[Special:Preferences#mw-prefsection-gadgets|Kokanga gadget]] mpo na kosalela mode ya molili.
continuum-night-mode-issue-reporting-not: Lakisa ntango balangi ya mode ya moindo esalaka ete makambo ezala mpasi mpo na kotánga.
continuum-night-mode-issue-reporting-lin: Lakisa likambo moko na mode ya molili
continuum-night-mode-issue-reporting-pre:
<!--
Instructions
Please describe how the dark mode colors are making Wikipedia difficult to read.
Please include the section of the article where you found the issue.
--> 
'''Bolimbisi ya likambo'''.
